Toledo.Toledo Christian Schools:
Toledo Christian Schools is a non-denomination, co-educational preschool through twelfth grade school located in Toledo, OH at 2303 Brookford Drive.


== Mission ==
Toledo Christian Schools working with Christian families, provides a college-preparatory Bible-centered educational program to educate, disciple, and prepare students to follow Christ and impact culture.


== Academics ==
Classical Christian Education


== Controversy ==
In 2016, the school was investigated by the Toledo Police Department after reports of sexual assault.
